name: Freewaters Trifecta Sandals - Men's
description:
Flip-flop comfort with a little extra stability. Ergonomically moulded footbeds and plush foam make them seriously comfortable. The adjustable top strap helps eliminate that sideways slide that flip-flops are prone to when walking over uneven ground.Top strap provides extra support on uneven ground.Supreem Foam is 10-15% recycled materials and offers comfort and plenty of rebound.Grippy rubber tread.Dyed with e.dye® Waterless Colour System™ that uses 75% less water, fewer chemicals and reduced CO2 emissions tahn traditional dyeing methods.PVC-free construction uses water based adhesives offering a safer alternative to commonly used solvent-based adhesives.Every pair of Freewaters sold helps support their global water initiatives, helping provide safe, clean drinking water for all.Since their 2011 launch Freewaters has 85 clean water projects around the globe.

        Sustainability
